code: import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BoldText=_ref=>{let{text}=_ref;const parseText=inputText=>{const parts=inputText.split(/(\*\*.*?\*\*|##.*?##)/);return parts.map((part,index)=>{if(part.startsWith("**")&&part.endsWith("**")){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[part.slice(2,-2)," "]},index);}if(part.startsWith("##")&&part.endsWith("##")){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{style:{fontSize:"larger"},children:[part.slice(2,-2)," "]},index);}return part;});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:parseText(text)});};export default BoldText;
